properties.areaDesc: Waters from Cape Blanco OR to Pt. St. George CA from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 15 at 1:30PM PST until February 16 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, south to southwest winds 20
to 25 kt and seas 8 to 10 ft at 13 seconds. For the Hazardous
Seas Watch, very steep and hazardous wind driven seas 10 ft.

* WHERE...Beyond 20 NM from shore Gold Beach southward. Closer to
shore north of Gold Beach.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, until 4 AM PST Sunday.
For the Hazardous Seas Watch, from Monday afternoon through
Tuesday morning.

* IMPACTS...For the Small Craft Advisory, gusty winds and/or steep
seas could capsize or damage smaller vessels. For the Hazardous
Seas Watch, very steep and hazardous seas could capsize or
damage vessels.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
Consider altering your plans to avoid possible hazardous and very
steep sea conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST SUNDAY... ...HAZARDOUS SEAS WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING
